name: tetris-train
description: A mobile Tetris game where a train rides over rails laid on Tetris blocks

scripts.network-info: node -e "console.log('Network Interfaces:'); const os = require('os'); const nets = os.networkInterfaces(); Object.keys(nets).forEach(name => { nets[name].forEach(net => { if (net.family === 'IPv4' && !net.internal) console.log(name + ': ' + net.address) }) })"
